Class LevelStatusUtils

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.copakond.sweetfluffysheep.model.utils.levels.LevelStatusUtils
public class LevelStatusUtils extends Object
Utility class for managing level status (completed, next level, etc.)

    • markLevelAsCompleted

      public static boolean markLevelAsCompleted(Level level)
      Marks the level as completed in the profile data.
      Parameters:
      level - The level to mark as completed.
      Returns:
      true if the level was marked as completed, false otherwise.

    • getNextUncompletedLevel

      public static int[] getNextUncompletedLevel()
      Returns the next uncompleted level. [levelId, customLevel] customLevel = 0-story mode, 1-custom level [1,0] if all levels are completed
      Returns:
      An array containing the level ID and custom level flag (0 for a story, 1 for custom).

    • getNextLevel

      public static Level getNextLevel(Level level)
      Returns the next level based on the current level. If the current level is the last one, repeats the last level.
      Parameters:
      level - The current level.
      Returns:
      The next level.
